name: AoR
description:
Hunt prehistoric creatures with your friends online. Build your own base, craft tools and weapons to survive in the first large-scale true cross-platform open world game running in your web browser.

Large Scale Open World
16 km2 of Uncharted territory to Explore with Jungle, Swamp and Winter bioms.

Crafting
Unlock and crafts stronger and durable tools and weapons as you level up.

Base Building
Impress your friends and the community with the biggest or weirdest looking base you can come up with.

Day and Night Cycle
You better of getting some fire going before Sunset :)

Play with Friends – COOP or PVP
Your friend will show up in seconds. No registration necessary, just send an invite link.

Rich Wildlife
New Dinos are added on a regular basis.

True Cross-Platform Experience
Pick up the game where you left off on any device in multiplayer.
